reviewText: Just buy this! I mean, come on, what better way to relive that 90s, whiteboy rap that you know you thought was so cool. Lets don't pretend you weren't cruising with your friends, rockin the Vanilla Ice. Relive those sweet jams as you head in to get side steps shaved into your hair and slits shaved into your brows. I got this as part of a white elephant gift. My college aged nephew got it and thought it was both hilarious and awesome. I got the cd with it and he has texted me more than once to let me know that he and his college buddies are loving them some Vanilla Ice.
